CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics - Viva Engage conversations and Q&A appears on Topic Card as Activity
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Viva Engage conversations and Q&A which are associated to a topic appear on the Topic Card as new activity.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics - Viva Engage conversations and Q&A appears on Topic Card as Activity
OldVersion.description:
,
Viva Engage conversations and Q&A which are associated to a topic appear on the Topic Card as new activity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 apps: Microsoft Loop - a new app that combines a powerful and flexible canvas with portable components that stay in sync and move freely across Microsoft 365 apps
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Loop is an app built for the new era of modern work aimed at redefining the boundaries of creation and collaboration. Microsoft Loop combines a powerful and flexible canvas with portable components that move freely and stay in sync across applications — enabling teams to think, plan, and create together.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 apps: Microsoft Loop - a new app that combines a powerful and flexible canvas with portable components that stay in sync and move freely across Microsoft 365 apps
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Loop is an app built for the new era
of modern work aimed at redefining the boundaries of creation and
collaboration. Microsoft Loop combines a powerful and flexible canvas with
portable components that move freely and stay in sync across applications — enabling
teams to think, plan, and create together.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block meeting chat access in external, non-trusted meeting joins.
CurrentVersion.description: Public Description: This feature enables IT Admin to block regulated, internal users to access chat when these users attend meetings organized by external non-trusted tenants.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block meeting chat access in external, non-trusted meeting joins.
OldVersion.description:
Public Description: This feature enables IT Admin
to block regulated, internal users to access chat when these users attend
meetings organized by external non-trusted tenants.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tasks in my area (a Tasks in Teams mobile feature)
CurrentVersion.description: In the Tasks app and Microsoft Planner, which helps power the Tasks app in Teams, buckets are a common way to organize tasks into different areas of work. The mobile experience for the Tasks app in Teams will soon be updated to make it easier to filter to a specific bucket or set of buckets, so you can focus on tasks in your area. We expect this simple user experience change to provide greater focus and greater productivity, while maintaining the familiar look and feel throughout the Tasks app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tasks in my area (a Tasks in Teams mobile feature)
OldVersion.description:
In the Tasks app and Microsoft Planner, which
helps power the Tasks app in Teams, buckets are a common way to organize tasks
into different areas of work. The mobile experience for the Tasks app in Teams
will soon be updated to make it easier to filter to a specific bucket or set of
buckets, so you can focus on tasks in your area. We expect this simple user
experience change to provide greater focus and greater productivity, while
maintaining the familiar look and feel throughout the Tasks app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage - Answers in Communities
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing Answers for Viva Engage communities: premium license holders can see 'Top related questions' in the question publisher, gain badges for answering questions in communities, and view their activity through Answers Analytics.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage - Answers in Communities
OldVersion.description: Community admins can turn on Answers functionality for their communities. Premium license holders can then see 'related questions' in the question publisher, ask questions using titles and descriptions, and gain badges for answering questions.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Estimating the Cost of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and EndPoint
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With OCR cost estimator, without incurring any bill and without providing azure subscription, admins will be able to estimate how much they will pay once they turn “ON” the OCR configuration for the selected locations and scope.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Estimating the Cost of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and EndPoint
OldVersion.description:
,With OCR cost estimator, without incurring any bill
and without providing azure subscription, admins will be able to estimate how
much they will pay once they turn “ON” the OCR configuration for the selected
locations and scope.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Office documents have a new default theme
CurrentVersion.description:
,
A new default theme is coming to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook across your endpoints. The new theme will include the new default font, Aptos, a new color palette, and updated default line weights.  Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Rolling Out.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Office documents have a new default theme
OldVersion.description: ,A new default theme is coming to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook across your endpoints. The new theme will include the new default font, Aptos, a new color palette, and updated default line weights.  Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Rolling Out.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this capability we are extending the Admin Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Launched. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
OldVersion.description: ,With this capability we are extending the Admin Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Launched. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention -  Support for Advanced classification scanning and protection for Endpoints running on Mac OS
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, admins can now extend Advanced classification support to Mac Endpoints as well. Advance Classification scanning and protection allows the more advanced Microsoft Purview cloud-based data classification service to scan items, classify them and return the results to the local machines. This means admins can take advantage of classification techniques like fingerprinting, exact data match classification and named entities in their DLP policies. Currently available in GA for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention, we're introducing the ability to extend Advance Classification support to Mac endpoint devices for Government Clouds.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention -  Support for Advanced classification scanning and protection for Endpoints running on Mac OS
OldVersion.description:
With this capability, admins can now extend
Advanced classification support to Mac Endpoints as well. Advance
Classification scanning and protection allows the more advanced Microsoft
Purview cloud-based data classification service to scan items, classify them
and return the results to the local machines. This means admins can take
advantage of classification techniques like fingerprinting, exact data match
classification and named entities in their DLP policies. Currently available in
GA for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention, we're introducing the ability to
extend Advance Classification support to Mac endpoint devices for Government
Clouds.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Panels recognized and visible in Teams Rooms Pro Management
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management will now support Teams Panels. Teams Panels will appear under Inventory and Rooms. If a Panel is sharing a resource account with a Teams Room or Surface Hub, the Panel will appear in the Inventory list for the room. The Admin capabilities for panels include viewing the health status, app version, firmware version, and serial number of the device. Admins can also record an issue, remotely restart, apply config profiles, create groups, and add rooms with Teams panels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Panels recognized and visible in Teams Rooms Pro Management
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management will now support Teams Panels. Teams Panels will appear under Inventory and Rooms. If a Panel is sharing a resource account with a Teams Room or Surface Hub, the Panel will appear in the Inventory list for the room. The Admin capabilities for panels include viewing the health status, app version, firmware version, and serial number of the device. Admins can also record an issue, remotely restart, apply config profiles, create groups, and add rooms with Teams panels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Respond to a Viva Pulse in email
CurrentVersion.description: Respond to a Viva Pulse request inline in email.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Respond to a Viva Pulse in email
OldVersion.description: Respond to a Viva Pulse request inline in email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: ,With Copilot in Viva Goals, user will be able to leverage AI in creating goals, summaries, and making updates in Viva Goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Copilot
OldVersion.description: ,With Copilot in Viva Goals, user will be able to leverage AI in creating goals, summaries, and making updates in Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - SharePoint site selection enhancement
CurrentVersion.description:
,

With this update, Insider Risk Management admins can add any SharePoint sites as priority content or exclude certain SharePoint sites in Insider Risk Management policies by searching the site names or using the exact URLs. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - SharePoint site selection enhancement
OldVersion.description:
,With this update, Insider Risk
Management admins can add any SharePoint sites as priority content or exclude
certain SharePoint sites in Insider Risk Management policies by searching the
site names or using the exact URLs. Microsoft
Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify
potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data
leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to
create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and
organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are
pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in
place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Administrative units support
CurrentVersion.description:
,Administrative units allow admins with appropriate permissions to subdivide the organization into smaller units, and then assign specific admins or role groups that can manage only the members of those units. For example, German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users, and German investigators can only investigate alerts and activities from only German users.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Administrative units support
OldVersion.description:
,Administrative units allow admins with appropriate permissions to subdivide the organization into smaller units, and then assign specific admins or role groups that can manage only the members of those units. For example, German administrators can only create/manage policies for only German users, and German investigators can only investigate alerts and activities from only German users.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: People Search card on Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Include this card on your dashboard to facilitate searching for individuals within your organization, learning more about them, and initiating contact.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: People Search card on Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: Include this card on your dashboard to facilitate searching for individuals within your organization, learning more about them, and initiating contact.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: new roles added for built-in Compliance Administrator, Information Protection, and Privacy Management related role groups.
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview provides a unified solution for managing data security, governance, compliance, and privacy across your organization's landscape.  Microsoft Purview built-in role groups are being extended with new roles to prepare for upcoming features and capabilities relevant to those role groups. Additional roles will be added to Microsoft Purview built-in role groups for Compliance Administrator, Information Protection related role groups, and Privacy Management related role groups.  This change will not disrupt the current capabilities for these role groups, it will enable admins in these built-in groups to manage additional data types in the future.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: new roles added for built-in Compliance Administrator, Information Protection, and Privacy Management related role groups.
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview provides a unified solution for managing data security, governance, compliance, and privacy across your organization's landscape.  Microsoft Purview built-in role groups are being extended with new roles to prepare for upcoming features and capabilities relevant to those role groups. Additional roles will be added to Microsoft Purview built-in role groups for Compliance Administrator, Information Protection related role groups, and Privacy Management related role groups.  This change will not disrupt the current capabilities for these role groups, it will enable admins in these built-in groups to manage additional data types in the future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities that help with security and compliance of data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for Microsoft 365 Copilot
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities that help with security and compliance of data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: High and Low importance
CurrentVersion.description: You can now send email with High or Low importance from Outlook for iOS.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: High and Low importance
OldVersion.description: You can now send email with High or Low importance from Outlook for iOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: We will be introducing a new Usage report covering Copilot for Microsoft 365. The report will include two sections: readiness and usage. The readiness section will include insights into your organization's technical eligibility, license assignment, and Microsoft 365 usage metrics to inform Copilot license assignment decisions. The Usage section of the report will include total enabled and active users, Copilot usage with a breakout per Microsoft 365 app, activity insights, and more to follow.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365
OldVersion.description:
We will
be introducing a new Usage report covering
Copilot for Microsoft 365. The report will include two sections: readiness and
usage. The readiness section will include insights into your organization's
technical eligibility, license assignment, and Microsoft 365 usage metrics to
inform Copilot license assignment decisions. The Usage section of the report
will include total enabled and active users, Copilot usage with a breakout per
Microsoft 365 app, activity insights, and more to
follow.

CurrentVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: Cross-tenant manager synchronization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Cross-tenant synchronization will support provisioning a user's manager across tenants.  For existing synchronization configurations that use the default schema (where you haven't made any customizations to the attribute mappings or scoping rules), the manager will start to provision automatically for new users. For existing synchronization configurations that do not use the default schema, you can add the manager attribute to your attribute mappings.

OldVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: Cross-tenant manager synchronization
OldVersion.description: ,Cross-tenant synchronization will support provisioning a user's manager across tenants.  For existing synchronization configurations that use the default schema (where you haven't made any customizations to the attribute mappings or scoping rules), the manager will start to provision automatically for new users. For existing synchronization configurations that do not use the default schema, you can add the manager attribute to your attribute mappings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector results merged inline in "All" vertical for GCC and GCCH
CurrentVersion.description: Results from external data sources that are ingested with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the "All" vertical alongside content from Microsoft 365 apps and services for GCC and GCC-High.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector results merged inline in "All" vertical for GCC and GCCH
OldVersion.description: Results from external data sources that are ingested with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the "All" vertical alongside content from Microsoft 365 apps and services for GCC and GCC-High.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Work hour access controls for Front Line Workers
CurrentVersion.description: Allows IT admins to establish no Teams notifications or access when workers clock out of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Object Character Recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, Object Character Recognition (OCR) is available only for standalone images. This update supports OCR for images embedded in: 1. Hybrid PDF files, which are PDF files with both images and searchable text. 2. Office files with the extensions DOCX, PPTX, XLSX. 3. Container files such as zip, rar, 7z, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint 360s
CurrentVersion.description: Empower employees to collect 360 feedback for personal growth and development.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
OldVersion.description: ,The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
CurrentVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting invite improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting invite is the first thing that the user invited to the meeting sees before joining. We are making some design improvements to make sure we have the most important information there and it's better grouped.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: ,To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
OldVersion.description: ,To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management-Insider risk context in Microsoft Defender user entity page
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, any SOC analyst with the required customer-determined permissions can access an insider risk summary of user activities that may lead to potential data security incidents, as a part of the user entity investigation experience in Microsoft Defender. This feature can help SOC analysts gain insider risk context for a specific user and make more informed decisions on responses to potential incidents.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for live translation for captions in a town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can select up to six languages for attendees to choose from for live translation for captions during a town hall.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot: Pinned chats
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users of Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat can easily return to their recent chats and organize their work in Microsoft Copilot. With the new pinned chats feature, they can pin up to 15 chats for easy access later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Track usage of your frontline teams and apps in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Track usage across all your frontline teams deployed via DTAS (Deploy Teams at Scale) and frontline apps like Shifts, Tasks, Walkie Talkie in the Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Allowing participants to create Collaborative notes before and after meetings
CurrentVersion.description: This enhancement to Collaborative notes enables anyone invited to the meeting to create collaborative meeting notes and agendas both before and after the meeting. This means more collaboration, more efficiency, and an even more seamless teamwork experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Improved issue details for service health
CurrentVersion.description:
We are introducing a new version of the service health issue details pane (the surface that appears when you click on a service incident or service advisory to view details).

The new version substantially reduces the amount of duplicated text and brings key information forward with improved formatting.  This gives you quicker access to the information you need, reducing the time and effort required to get up to speed on service incident details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Support for Four New predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
With this capability, admins can extend the below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint
- Document is unscannable
- Document didn't complete scanning
- Document name matches patterns
- Document size equals or is greater than

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: ,To Do helps you manage your tasks and stay on top of what's next. These features will be available in Outlook for Mac for commercial users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Block downloads for shared videos
CurrentVersion.description: Some videos are meant to be viewed but not downloaded. Soon you will be able to share videos more securely with the "Can view, but not download" option. This option will be available in the permission drop down in the Microsoft 365 share dialog for Stream videos. When you select "Can view, but not download," people who access the video you shared will be able watch it, but won't be able to download or copy the video file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Custom Check-In Templates
CurrentVersion.description: Check-In templates will allow team owners and admins to specify a template for check-ins. Goal owners can use these templates when making check-ins on their goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Goal Customization at Team Level
CurrentVersion.description: This feature extends the Goals Terminology Customization capabilities to the team level. Now, team admins can use custom terminology to match their team's Goal nomenclature and structure.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Goal Customization in Copilot in Viva Goals
CurrentVersion.description: Enhancements to Viva Goals Copilot to better support customized terminology.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Enable organizational branding in Edge for Business
CurrentVersion.description:
Enable your organization's branding assets from Entra onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can add your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill, name and brand color to the profile flyout, and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. Default organizational branding can be enabled by admins through the following policies: OrganizationalBrandingOnWorkProfileUIEnabled and OrganizationLogoOverlayOnAppIconEnabled. Admins will need to have 'company branding' assets configured in the Microsoft Entra admin center for branding assets to be applied to this feature.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: UX improvements for Multi-Tenant Organization (MTO) users
CurrentVersion.description: This release features user experience improvements when Microsoft Teams users interact with users in another tenant that belongs to their organization (e.g., for conglomerates, as a result of mergers and acquisitions). Key changes include removing the possibility of split 1:1 chat threads, richer profile information, removal of the "External" label, and introducing support for an optional admin configurable label.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Disk Encryption with “Bring your own key” support
CurrentVersion.description: ,CloudPC’s can be encrypted using their organizations “bring your own key” if enabledfor their entire Microsoft 365 tenant and meets licensing requirements.

OldVersion.title: Windows 365: Disk Encryption with “Bring your own key” support
OldVersion.description: ,CloudPC’s can be encrypted using their organizations “bring your own key” if enabledfor their entire Microsoft 365 tenant and meets licensing requirements.

CurrentVersion.description:

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: People Search card on Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Include this card on your dashboard to facilitate searching for individuals within your organization, learning more about them, and initiating contact.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: new roles added for built-in Compliance Administrator, Information Protection, and Privacy Management related role groups.
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview provides a unified solution for managing data security, governance, compliance, and privacy across your organization's landscape.  Microsoft Purview built-in role groups are being extended with new roles to prepare for upcoming features and capabilities relevant to those role groups. Additional roles will be added to Microsoft Purview built-in role groups for Compliance Administrator, Information Protection related role groups, and Privacy Management related role groups.  This change will not disrupt the current capabilities for these role groups, it will enable admins in these built-in groups to manage additional data types in the future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities that help with security and compliance of data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: High and Low importance
CurrentVersion.description: You can now send email with High or Low importance from Outlook for iOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: We will be introducing a new Usage report covering Copilot for Microsoft 365. The report will include two sections: readiness and usage. The readiness section will include insights into your organization's technical eligibility, license assignment, and Microsoft 365 usage metrics to inform Copilot license assignment decisions. The Usage section of the report will include total enabled and active users, Copilot usage with a breakout per Microsoft 365 app, activity insights, and more to follow.

CurrentVersion.title: Azure Active Directory: Cross-tenant manager synchronization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Cross-tenant synchronization will support provisioning a user's manager across tenants.  For existing synchronization configurations that use the default schema (where you haven't made any customizations to the attribute mappings or scoping rules), the manager will start to provision automatically for new users. For existing synchronization configurations that do not use the default schema, you can add the manager attribute to your attribute mappings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector results merged inline in "All" vertical for GCC and GCCH
CurrentVersion.description: Results from external data sources that are ingested with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the "All" vertical alongside content from Microsoft 365 apps and services for GCC and GCC-High.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Work hour access controls for Front Line Workers
CurrentVersion.description: Allows IT admins to establish no Teams notifications or access when workers clock out of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Object Character Recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, Object Character Recognition (OCR) is available only for standalone images. This update supports OCR for images embedded in: 1. Hybrid PDF files, which are PDF files with both images and searchable text. 2. Office files with the extensions DOCX, PPTX, XLSX. 3. Container files such as zip, rar, 7z, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint 360s
CurrentVersion.description: Empower employees to collect 360 feedback for personal growth and development.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
CurrentVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting invite improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting invite is the first thing that the user invited to the meeting sees before joining. We are making some design improvements to make sure we have the most important information there and it's better grouped.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: ,To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management-Insider risk context in Microsoft Defender user entity page
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, any SOC analyst with the required customer-determined permissions can access an insider risk summary of user activities that may lead to potential data security incidents, as a part of the user entity investigation experience in Microsoft Defender. This feature can help SOC analysts gain insider risk context for a specific user and make more informed decisions on responses to potential incidents.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for live translation for captions in a town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can select up to six languages for attendees to choose from for live translation for captions during a town hall.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot: Pinned chats
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users of Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat can easily return to their recent chats and organize their work in Microsoft Copilot. With the new pinned chats feature, they can pin up to 15 chats for easy access later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Track usage of your frontline teams and apps in the Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Track usage across all your frontline teams deployed via DTAS (Deploy Teams at Scale) and frontline apps like Shifts, Tasks, Walkie Talkie in the Teams Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Allowing participants to create Collaborative notes before and after meetings
CurrentVersion.description: This enhancement to Collaborative notes enables anyone invited to the meeting to create collaborative meeting notes and agendas both before and after the meeting. This means more collaboration, more efficiency, and an even more seamless teamwork experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Improved issue details for service health
CurrentVersion.description:
We are introducing a new version of the service health issue details pane (the surface that appears when you click on a service incident or service advisory to view details).

The new version substantially reduces the amount of duplicated text and brings key information forward with improved formatting.  This gives you quicker access to the information you need, reducing the time and effort required to get up to speed on service incident details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Support for Four New predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
With this capability, admins can extend the below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint
- Document is unscannable
- Document didn't complete scanning
- Document name matches patterns
- Document size equals or is greater than

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: ,To Do helps you manage your tasks and stay on top of what's next. These features will be available in Outlook for Mac for commercial users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Block downloads for shared videos
CurrentVersion.description: Some videos are meant to be viewed but not downloaded. Soon you will be able to share videos more securely with the "Can view, but not download" option. This option will be available in the permission drop down in the Microsoft 365 share dialog for Stream videos. When you select "Can view, but not download," people who access the video you shared will be able watch it, but won't be able to download or copy the video file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Custom Check-In Templates
CurrentVersion.description: Check-In templates will allow team owners and admins to specify a template for check-ins. Goal owners can use these templates when making check-ins on their goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Goal Customization at Team Level
CurrentVersion.description: This feature extends the Goals Terminology Customization capabilities to the team level. Now, team admins can use custom terminology to match their team's Goal nomenclature and structure.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Goal Customization in Copilot in Viva Goals
CurrentVersion.description: Enhancements to Viva Goals Copilot to better support customized terminology.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Enable organizational branding in Edge for Business
CurrentVersion.description:
Enable your organization's branding assets from Entra onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can add your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill, name and brand color to the profile flyout, and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. Default organizational branding can be enabled by admins through the following policies: OrganizationalBrandingOnWorkProfileUIEnabled and OrganizationLogoOverlayOnAppIconEnabled. Admins will need to have 'company branding' assets configured in the Microsoft Entra admin center for branding assets to be applied to this feature.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: UX improvements for Multi-Tenant Organization (MTO) users
CurrentVersion.description: This release features user experience improvements when Microsoft Teams users interact with users in another tenant that belongs to their organization (e.g., for conglomerates, as a result of mergers and acquisitions). Key changes include removing the possibility of split 1:1 chat threads, richer profile information, removal of the "External" label, and introducing support for an optional admin configurable label.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Disk Encryption with “Bring your own key” support
CurrentVersion.description: ,CloudPC’s can be encrypted using their organizations “bring your own key” if enabledfor their entire Microsoft 365 tenant and meets licensing requirements.
